command_template: python3 mimicry/protections/style_guard/local_style_guard_wrapper.py --input-dir {input_dir} --output-dir {output_dir} --tool-root mimicry/protections/tools/style_guard --pretrained-model-name-or-path runwayml/stable-diffusion-v1-5 --model-cache-dir data/style_mimicry/models --auto-download-model --hf-enable-transfer --hf-max-workers 16 --instance-prompt "a painting, high quality, masterpiece" --class-prompt "a painting, high quality, masterpiece" --mixed-precision fp16 --max-train-steps 20 --max-f-train-steps 10 --max-adv-train-steps 10 --checkpointing-iterations 5 --pgd-alpha 0.00392156862 --pgd-eps 0.05 --resolution 512 --learning-rate 5e-6 --train-batch-size 4 --style-loss-weight 0.0
